FAQ.question: Why is the Sale Deed essential for agricultural land?
FAQ.answer: It is the final registered proof of ownership and required for mutation and RTC update.

FAQ.question: Does the Sale Deed mention survey and hissa numbers?
FAQ.answer: Yes. Agricultural Sale Deeds must include survey number, sub-division number, and extent.

FAQ.question: Can I download a certified copy online?
FAQ.answer: Yes. Certified copies are available through Kaveri Online Services via JaaGa.
